properties.areaDesc: Hamlin Beach to Sodus Bay NY; Niagara River to Hamlin Beach NY
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 5 at 9:10PM EST until February 6 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 10 to 20 knots and waves 4 to 7 feet
expected.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Ontario from the Niagara
River to Sodus Bay.

* WHEN...From 4 AM to 7 PM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Winds and/or waves will cause hazardous conditions
that could capsize or damage small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY
